snippet: The official, Yevgenia N. Vasilyeva, who ran a Defense Ministry property contracting company, was found guilty of embezzlement and money laundering.
abstract: Russian court sentences former Defense Ministry contractor Yevgenia N. Vasilyeva to five years in prison for embezzlement and money laundering; corruption investigation led Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin to fire former Defense Min Anatoly E Serdyukov.
lead_paragraph: The official, Yevgenia N. Vasilyeva, who ran a Defense Ministry property contracting company, was found guilty of embezzlement and money laundering.

headline.main: Russian Court Sentences Ex-Official to 5 Years in Prison in Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: Ex-Official Gets a 5-Year Term
